controller

Class PhotoDisplayController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.Controller
      • controller.PhotoDisplayController

  • public class PhotoDisplayController
extends Controller
    This class deals with the logic in the photo display screen
    Author:
    Sarah Squillace, Nikita Zala
